select expend.*,un.*,user.*,uf_entry.* from uf_expenditurerecord expend JOIN uf_union un on expend.er_union_id = un.un_id JOIN uf_user user on expend.er_user_id = user.user_id JOIN uf_entry on expend.er_entry_id = uf_entry.en_id order by expend.er_date desc limit #{0},#{1}
